titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to honor America's barbers.
Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to honor America's barbers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service to honor America's barbers.
